name: sBeed
description:
sBeed

It's a Bee, it has Speed... it's a sBeed!

sBeed is an endless runner...? "Endless flyer" where a fast bee must collect nectar in outter space while dodging meteorites (No, those are not cookies even though they look like one). You'll sbeed up with each nectar you collect.

Tired of going back to the title screen when you lose? No problem! Just keep going trying to get the highest score.

A little bit of history...

sBeed was the first game I published. It started as my first approach to publish it in the Google Play Store, so I decided to make a little game and learn about it.

How to play

As it was designed to be played on phones, the way to play it is using swipes on the screen, thus if you are playing it on Windows, you must click and drag the mouse to move the bee to it's sides.

Credits

Music was made by TeknoAxe
